name: The Lord Of Xamino [Pre Alpha]
description:
We present The Lord Of Xamino in its Pre Alpha version.

A beautiful metroidvania starring Kylan, a knight from an ancient dynasty that is presumed extinct.

Xamino is the only planet that has resisted the invasion of the Droidums. A prophecy speaks of the 5 sacred fires and that the order of the universe revolves around them. What will Kylan have to do with all this?
